languages.text: "Я слишком привык ненавидеть". {n}Соломон впервые за разговор касается загривка Глейто.{/n} "Даже не знаю, как выглядит жизнь без ненависти. Не так паршиво, наверное".

"I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."
languages.original_text: "Я слишком привык ненавидеть". {n}Соломон впервые за разговор касается загривка Глейто.{/n} "Даже не знаю, как выглядит жизнь без ненависти. Не так паршиво, наверное".

"I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

languages.text: 「憎むことに慣れすぎた」{n}ソロモーンは、話し始めてから初めて、グライトの首の後ろに手を置いた。{/n}「憎しみのない人生がどんなものか、もうわからない。ただ、それほどひどくはないだろうとしか」
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: 「憎むことに慣れすぎた」{n}ソロモーンは、話し始めてから初めて、グライトの首の後ろに手を置いた。{/n}「憎しみのない人生がどんなものか、もうわからない。ただ、それほどひどくはないだろうとしか」

languages.text: "Ich bin zu sehr daran gewöhnt, zu hassen." {n}Solomorne legt seine Hand zum ersten Mal seit dem Beginn eures Gesprächs auf Glaitos Nacken.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht einmal, wie sich ein Leben ohne Hass anfühlt. Vielleicht nicht ganz so lausig."
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin zu sehr daran gewöhnt, zu hassen." {n}Solomorne legt seine Hand zum ersten Mal seit dem Beginn eures Gesprächs auf Glaitos Nacken.{/n} "Ich weiß nicht einmal, wie sich ein Leben ohne Hass anfühlt. Vielleicht nicht ganz so lausig."

languages.text: « Je suis trop habitué à haïr. » {n}Solomorne pose sa main sur la nuque de Glaito pour la première fois depuis le début de votre échange.{/n} « Je ne peux même pas imaginer à quoi pourrait ressembler une vie sans haine. Peut-être que ce ne serait pas si terrible, après tout. »
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis trop habitué à haïr. » {n}Solomorne pose sa main sur la nuque de Glaito pour la première fois depuis le début de votre échange.{/n} « Je ne peux même pas imaginer à quoi pourrait ressembler une vie sans haine. Peut-être que ce ne serait pas si terrible, après tout. »

languages.text: «Estoy demasiado acostumbrado a odiar». {n}Solomorne posa la mano en el pescuezo de Glaito por primera vez desde que los dos empezasteis a hablar.{/n} «Ni siquiera sé cómo es la vida sin tanto odio. Imagino que no tan mala».
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy demasiado acostumbrado a odiar». {n}Solomorne posa la mano en el pescuezo de Glaito por primera vez desde que los dos empezasteis a hablar.{/n} «Ni siquiera sé cómo es la vida sin tanto odio. Imagino que no tan mala».

languages.text: “我已经太习惯于仇恨了。”{n}自从这场谈话以来，这还是索罗蒙第一次将手搭在格雷托的脖颈后面。{/n}“我甚至想象不出来，没有仇恨的人生会是什么样子。可能也不会太烂吧，我估计。”
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: “我已经太习惯于仇恨了。”{n}自从这场谈话以来，这还是索罗蒙第一次将手搭在格雷托的脖颈后面。{/n}“我甚至想象不出来，没有仇恨的人生会是什么样子。可能也不会太烂吧，我估计。”

languages.text: "Nefrete alıştım iyice." {n}Solomorne, ikiniz konuşmaya başladığınızdan bu yana ilk kez elini Glaito'nun boynuna koyuyor.{/n} "Nefretin olmadığı bir hayatın nasıl olacağını bilemiyorum. Belki bu kadar gürültülü patırtılı olmazdı."
languages.original_text: "I'm too used to hating." {n}Solomorne rests his hand on the back of Glaito's neck for the first time since the two of you began talking.{/n} "I don't even know what life without hatred would look like. Not so lousy, perhaps."

traits.locale_text: "Nefrete alıştım iyice." {n}Solomorne, ikiniz konuşmaya başladığınızdan bu yana ilk kez elini Glaito'nun boynuna koyar.{/n} "Nefretin olmadığı bir yaşam nasıl olurdu hiçbir fikrim yok. Belki de bu kadar gürültülü patırtılı olmazdı."
